New Records: The Chicago White Sox avoided breaking the MLB record for the worst season (120 losses) by sweeping the Los Angeles Angels, ending their season with 106 losses
Key Match Events: The White Sox swept the Angels in their last home series, including a 7-0 win, and the series outcome led to mixed fan reactions, with some fans cheering for losses
Pre-Game Insights: Fans hoped to watch the Sox lose to set a new record, indicating anticipation for a potential historical outcome
Post-Match Reflections: The Sox's win led to a standing ovation and mixed emotions among fans, with some disappointed the team didn't break the loss record and others cheering the victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: The atmosphere at the game was hostile, with fans wearing paper bags over their heads and the team offering promotions to attract crowds
